name: HOLIDAY CATS
description:
You are a postcat who has just finished their deliveries, time to find something to do tonight, and its a cold one out...

Controls
WASD: Move
Arrow Keys: Look
E: Talk
C: Center Look
M: Toggle Mute

Made for the 32-bit Holiday Jam

If for any reason the web version does not work for you, or you want better performance, downloadable versions are available below

Submission time is a bit off, I published this 12/29/202 9:33PM EST, just about 24 hours before the deadline, It says it was earlier because I uploaded test versions early on to make sure this worked on the web :P
